001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class as a <b>Value Object</b> in the domain model.
007 *
008 * <p>
009 * A Value Object represents a domain concept that is defined
010 * entirely by its <b>attributes</b>, with no identity of its own.
011 * Value Objects equality is based on comparing their values.
012 * </p>
013 *
014 * <h3>Characteristics:</h3>
015 * <ul>
016 *   <li>No unique identifier; identity is not tracked.</li>
017 *   <li>Equality is by comparing all attributes.</li>
018 * </ul>
019 */
020@Documented
021@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.HELPER_STRUCTURES)
022@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
023@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
024public @interface ValueObject {
025}
